short_summary: ONE PHASE SELECTION PROCESS: Bidder to submit financial bid on the project based on specifications and drawings.
description: Annual Spring Dredging, Toney River, NS
duration_in_months: usefully 15 months of duration from the awarded Contract start date and expected contract end date.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Annual Spring Dredging, Toney River

### Background

Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the Annual Spring Dredging, Toney River project. The project involves providing marine construction services to remove approximately 15,000 cubic meters of material from Toney River, Pictou County, Nova Scotia.

### Project Scope

The work includes furnishing all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials for the dredging operation. The contract requires adherence to the specifications and accompanying drawings, as well as all terms and conditions outlined in the contract.

### Contract Details

*   The contract period consists of two cycles:
    *   Cycle 1: Contract award to May 31, 2024
        *   Deliverables: Complete the dredging operation and demobilize equipment within 3-4 weeks
    *   Cycle 2: April 1, 2025 to May 31, 2025
        *   Deliverables: Complete the dredging operation and demobilize equipment within 3-4 weeks
*   The contract includes mobilization and demobilization of all necessary equipment.
*   Payment will be made based on the Unit Price Table, which outlines the items to be measured for payment.

### Tender Requirements

*   A detailed bid proposal outlining the contractor's approach to completing the project.
*   A comprehensive financial bid, including a fixed price for the contract.
*   A description of the equipment and materials to be used for the dredging operation.
*   A timeline for completing the project, including specific dates for mobilization and demobilization.

### Process

The tender process is a one-phase selection process. Bidders will submit their bid proposals to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

### Important Dates

*   Tender closing date: March 18, 2024
*   Expected contract start date: April 1, 2024
*   Expected contract end date: May 31, 2025

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Tammy O'Toole at Fisheries and Oceans Canada.

*   Email: [tammy.otoole@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:tammy.otoole@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (343) 550-1758

### Additional Resources

*   Specifications and drawings: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/web
